column4: I have 3 harddrives, a 300GB, 150GB and a 100GB. Is there anyway to combine them all to act as one drive?
yes... you can use LVM... but if one drive dies, you loose ALL the data
and by fail, do you mean fail totally or what if it just starts to hiccup for a bit and then works again?
yea, but what if it just fails for a bit and then comes back, will they all be ok?
